amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from and prohibit any communication that is protected under the First Amendment to the United States Constitution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part A of House Report 115-21 to exempt from the rule's prohibited communications any communication that is protected under the First Amendment to the Constitution of the United States of America.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 189 - 232 (Roll no. 124).

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
